description: 1. Red color. 2. Internet slang for failing an exam (because the exam paper is covered in red ink from corrections).

examples.chinese: 今天考试语文作文考了满江红
examples.translation: I failed the essay part of the Chinese exam today (got a lot of red marks).

examples.chinese: 大姨妈真的太突然了,走到公司就已经满江红了
examples.translation: My period came really suddenly; by the time I got to the office, it was already a 「sea of red」.
